page.title: 10Crane Moor 2
page.content: The eleven houses called New Bailey are made of brick and stone. They are the newest houses in Crane Moor and were built twelve years ago. There is a new stone bungalow in Crane Moor Nook. From the centre of Crane Moor you can see fields and woods all around you.The village is at the bottom of three hills with farms and woodland surrounding it. We think it is a lot better than being in a town and staring into other houses. We have one club and one inn.The club is a Working Man's Club.The public house is called the Rock Inn and it has a restaurant.
